verses.verse: And it shall come to pass<WH1697>, when all these things are come<WH935> upon you<WH1293>, the blessing and the curse<WH7045>, which I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you<WH7725>, and you shall call them to mind<WH3824> among all the nations<WH1471>, where the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has driven you<WH5080>,

And shall return<WH7725> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and shall obey<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> according to all that I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, you and your sons<WH1121>, with all your heart<WH3824>, and with all your soul<WH5315>;

That then the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will turn<WH7725> your captivity<WH7622>, and have compassion<WH7355> upon you<WH7725>, and will return and gather<WH6908> you from all the nations<WH5971>, where the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has scattered you<WH6327>.
If any of your be driven out<WH5080> unto the uttermost<WH7097> parts of heaven<WH8064>, from there will the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gather<WH6908> you<WH3947>, and from there will he fetch you:

And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which your fathers<WH1> possessed<WH3423>, and you shall possess<WH3423> it<WH3190>; and he will do you good, and multiply<WH7235> you above your fathers<WH1>.

And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will circumcise<WH4135> your heart<WH3824>, and the heart<WH3824> of your seed<WH2233>, to love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart<WH3824>, and with all your soul<WH5315>, that you may live<WH2416>.
And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will put<WH5414> all these curses<WH423> upon your enemies<WH341>, and on them that hate<WH8130> you<WH7291>, which persecuted you.
And you shall return<WH7725> and obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068>, and do<WH6213> all his commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>.

And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will make you plentiful<WH3498> in every work<WH4639> of your hand<WH3027>, in the fruit<WH6529> of your body<WH990>, and in the fruit<WH6529> of your cattle<WH929>, and in the fruit<WH6529> of your land<WH127>, for good<WH2896>: for the Lord<WH3068> will again<WH7725> rejoice<WH7797> over you for good<WH2896>, as he rejoiced<WH7797> over your fathers<WH1>:

If you shall listen<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which are written<WH3789> in this book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451>, and if you turn<WH7725> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart<WH3824>, and with all your soul<WH5315>.
For this commandment<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, it is not hidden<WH6381> from you<WH7350>, neither is it far off.
It is not in heaven<WH8064>, that you should say<WH559>, Who shall go up<WH5927> for us to heaven<WH8064>, and bring<WH3947> it unto us<WH8085>, that we may hear it<WH6213>, and do it?

Neither is it beyond<WH5676> the sea<WH3220>, that you should say<WH559>, Who shall go<WH5674> over<WH5676> the sea<WH3220> for us<WH3947>, and bring it unto us<WH8085>, that we may hear it<WH6213>, and do it?
But the word<WH1697> is very<WH3966> near<WH7138> unto you<WH6310>, in your mouth, and in your heart<WH3824>, that you may do it<WH6213>.
See<WH7200>, I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day<WH3117> life<WH2416> and good<WH2896>, and death<WH4194> and evil<WH7451>;

In that I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117> to love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, to walk<WH3212> in his ways<WH1870>, and to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> and his judgments<WH4941>, that you may live<WH2421> and multiply<WH7235>: and the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> you in the land<WH776> where you go<WH935> to possess it<WH3423>.
But if your heart<WH3824> turn away<WH6437>, so that you will not hear<WH8085>, but shall be drawn away<WH5080>, and worship<WH7812> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and serve them<WH5647>;

I denounce<WH5046> unto you this day<WH3117>, that you shall surely<WH6> perish<WH6>, and that you shall not prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> upon the land<WH127>, where you pass over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> to go<WH935> to possess it<WH3423>.

I call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to record<WH5749> this day<WH3117> against you<WH5414>, that I have set before<WH6440> you life<WH2416> and death<WH4194>, blessing<WH1293> and cursing<WH7045>: therefore choose<WH977> life<WH2416>, that both you and your seed<WH2233> may live<WH2421>:

That you may love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and that you may obey<WH8085> his voice<WH6963>, and that you may cleave<WH1692> unto him<WH2416>: for he is your life, and the length<WH753> of your days<WH3117>: that you may live<WH3427> in the land<WH127> which the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, to Abraham<WH85>, to Isaac<WH3327>, and to Jacob<WH3290>, to give them<WH5414>.
